cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.iface

Interface IDAO<Entity extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    Entity - Entity's type
    PK - Primary key's type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IArticleDAO, ICodeDAO, ICompileInfoDAO, IContestDAO, IContestProblemDAO, IContestTeamInfoDAO, IContestUserDAO, IDepartmentDAO, IDiscussDAO, ILanguageDAO, IMessageDAO, IProblemDAO, IProblemTagDAO, IStatusDAO, ITagDAO, IUserDAO, IUserSerialKeyDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticleDAO, CodeDAO, CompileInfoDAO, ContestDAO, ContestProblemDAO, ContestTeamInfoDAO, ContestUserDAO, DAO, DepartmentDAO, DiscussDAO, LanguageDAO, MessageDAO, ProblemDAO, ProblemTagDAO, StatusDAO, TagDAO, UserDAO, UserSerialKeyDAO

    public interface IDAO<Entity extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>
    Global DAO interface.
    Author:
    fish

        value - field's value
        propertyName - property's name for JoinColumn

        unique result, null if not exist
